message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, but you get a decent chunk!
I'll give you a bit more, but not too much!
You're getting desperate, take it or leave it!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
You're running out of time, take the crumbs!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going to give up yet!
You're almost out of options, take it now!
I'll give you almost all of it, but I'm not going to give up without a fight!
